attributes.action: After the catalogue of programs on the standard of british banking and its duty of care toward its customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a disabled customer with Nat West and barclays and suffed both discrimination and high charges. I have watched with horror program after program about the lack of standards and misconduct in the banking and credit card industry. I feel its time that the government (Mr Brown at no:11) and the FSA started asking banks what's going on, as most banks and credit card companies are licenced, something needs to change desperately and could these licence be removed,most of us are hard honest working people who are supposed to be living in a demorcratic society its time for action.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
